--- title: "WIC Clinic Dashboard" title-block-banner: TRUE fig-width: 7 fig-height: 5 fig-dpi: 300 warning: FALSE error: TRUE echo: FALSE message: FALSE params: goal_category: "theme" format: html: toc: false editor: source --- ::: {.cell} ::: # Clinic phases ::: {.cell-output-display} ## 1
* Is there a television present? * Is the television utilized appropriately? * Is there developmentally appropriate entertainment available for children in every room? * Is the environment peaceful and neutral, including factors such as smells and sounds? * Are staff members properly welcoming, greeting clients with a friendly "Hi, Welcome to WIC"? * Is staff at entrance to greet and provide information promptly? * Is staff communicating options to walk-ins? * Is water visible and available to clients? * Is the current WIC logo on or above entrance? * Are accurate hours of operation displayed on door in a permanent format? * Does the entire scope of practice take place in a private room? * Do all rooms display the Jordan Michael Design? * Do all private rooms display room status indicators? * Is the WIC material QR code visible, colorful & intentional? * Is the WIC material QR code linked to the WIC shopping guide? * Is the WIC material QR code linked to social media? * Is the WIC material QR code linked to the WIC cookbook? * Is the WIC material QR code linked to state website? * Is a clinic manager or supervisor present?
## 2
* Are there a minimum of 2 padded chairs available for clients? * Is the desk size within the maximum limit of 8 sq ft? * Is the lab equipment area within the maximum limit of 12 sq ft? * Is there a small filing cabinet? * Are at least 3 wall hangings displayed? * Are sharp corners covered to ensure safety? * Are electrical outlets covered to ensure safety? * Is the hazard box placed up and out reach? * Has any flammable clutter been removed? * Are confidential conversations conducted with the door closed? * Is alternative lighting available? * Are padded or gel chairs available for comfort? * Are interactive rugs provided for children? * Are kitchen sets available for children? * Is there at least one child chair provided? * Are children's books visible and accessible? * Is there a standard filing system in place for forms? * Are gloves mounted on the wall for easy access? * Is there a rolling cart available in each room? * Do clients stay in the same room throughout their visit? * Is there a dedicated room for each certifier? * How many families are currently waiting?
:::
